title: chore: core
description: Upgrade the `@tscircuit/core` dependency from version `0.0.245` to `0.0.362`.

title: Add `connections` prop for resistor and capacitor
description: Add `connections` prop for resistor and capacitor

title: Selectors definition and docstrings for connections and selectors
description: Defines selectors and connections as utility types, and exports them properly.

title: add support for ChipProps without pinLabels record
description: Add support for `ChipProps` without `pinLabels` record

title: Add support for pseudo-deprecated innerWidth and innerHeight
description: Add support for pseudo-deprecated `innerWidth` and `innerHeight` properties in `PlatedHoleProps` and `PillPlatedHoleProps`.

title: Oval plated hole should use holeWidth/holeHeigth instead of innerWidth/innerHeight
description: The pull request updates the `platedhole.ts` component to use `holeWidth` and `holeHeight` instead of `innerWidth` and `innerHeight` for oval plated holes.

title: Pill plated hole should use holeWidth/holeHeigth instead of innerWidth/innerHeight
description: Changes the properties used for a "pill" plated hole from `innerWidth`/`innerHeight` to `holeWidth`/`holeHeight`.

title: Fix pinheader in 3d view
description: Fix a bug where the hull plan can have an array of operations in its shapes, but the plan executioner doesn't throw an error when the input is an array.

title: make zod a peer dep
description: Change zod from a direct dependency to a peer dependency

title: update birpc to latest version
description: Update the version of the `birpc` dependency to `2.3.0`.

title: perform drc checks after async autorouting
description: Perform DRC checks after async autorouting

title: Fix resistor/capacitor connections prop
description: Fix resistor/capacitor connections prop

title: Add support for modules/components defined with `connections` and `selectors` to `sel`. Improved `ChipProps` handling
description: Adds support for modules/components defined with `connections` and `selectors` to `sel`, and improves `ChipProps` handling.

title: abstract pcb and schematic manual edits method
description: Abstracts the PCB and schematic manual edits method to handle both schematic and PCB edit events separately.

title: Bump props to 0.0.167
description: Update the dependency "@tscircuit/props" to version 0.0.167

title: applySchematicEditEventsToManualEditsFile method added
description: Adds a method `applySchematicEditEventsToManualEditsFile` that updates the `schematic_placements` field in the `manual_edits_file` based on the `edit_schematic_component_location` edit events.

title: chore: add pr-analysis to commit
description: Add a new script to analyze pull requests

title: add andrii-balitskyi to staff list
description: Add Andrii Balitskyi to the staff list

title: refactor(contributor): add discussion metrics and scoring to contributor stats
description: The pull request introduces new fields to the `ContributorStats` interface to track discussion participation levels and related metrics, and implements a scoring system based on these metrics, converting the score to a star rating.

title: feat: add storePrAnalysis function to save analyzed PRs
description: Introduce a new function `storePrAnalysis` to save analyzed PR data to a JSON file.

title: feat: add major tag detection for pull requests
description: Introduce functionality to detect `/major` tags in **merged pull requests**, including checks in titles, bodies, and maintainer comments, allowing for automatic impact classification of PRs based on the presence of the tag.

title: refactor(useContributorsData): handle both PR formats with and without contributor
description: The changes allow the hook to process PR rows in tables with and without contributor information, ensuring compatibility with different markdown formats and improving the robustness of the data extraction logic.

title: style(ContributorOverview): update ring and background colors for 2nd place
description: Update ring and background colors for the 2nd place contributor

title: feat: add new format latest snippet page
description: Adds a new "Latest Snippets" page to the application.

title: Fixed the overflow text for BOM view
description: Fixed the overflow text for BOM view

title: feat: add clickToInteractEnabled prop
description: Add a "clickToInteractEnabled" prop to the CadViewer and SchematicViewer components.

title: Created a underlined text “show hidden files” for showing/hiding files
description: Created a dropdown menu to toggle showing/hiding hidden files in the files view.

title: feat(package_files): add CRUD operations for package files
description: Introduce new functionality to create, update, and delete package files.

title: add useDeletePackage hook to move from /snippets to /packages
description: Introduce a new `useDeletePackage` hook and replace the `useConfirmDeleteSnippetDialog` with `useConfirmDeletePackageDialog` in the `EditorNav` component.

title: fix fork by using the `/fork` endpoint
description: Fixes the fork functionality by using the `/fork` endpoint instead of the previous approach.

title: refactor(Footer): remove "Create with AI" from list and add as standalone link
description: The "Create with AI" link was moved from the list of navigation items to a standalone link in the footer.

title: support `/fork` endpoint for packages
description: Adds a new `/packages/fork` endpoint to the API, allowing users to fork existing packages.

title: big refactor: tests to not use hardcoded session values
description: Refactors the tests to remove hardcoded session values and use dynamic values from the test server.

title: feat: support schematic manual edits
description: The pull request adds support for manual edits in the schematic, in addition to the existing support for PCB edits.

title: feat: add trending page to display popular snippets
description: Add a new trending page to display popular snippets

title: feat: when json not avail, blank out the tabs
description: The change adds a check for the availability of circuitJson and displays appropriate UI for disabled views.

title: feat(routing): add 404 page and handle not found states
description: Add a new 404 page to handle cases where users navigate to non-existent routes or packages.

title: Revert "feat(routing): add 404 page and handle not found states"
description: Reverts the addition of a 404 page and handling of not found states.

title: feat(routing): add 404 page and handle not found states
description: Add a new 404 page to handle cases where users navigate to non-existent routes or packages.

title: refactor(DownloadButtonAndMenu): wrap disabled button in div &use asChild for DropdownMenuTrigger
description: Wrap the disabled button in a div to improve structure and use `asChild` for DropdownMenuTrigger to ensure proper component composition.

title: feat(package-details): add edit package details dialog and update sidebar UI
description: Add edit package details dialog and update sidebar UI

title: fix: text snippets to packages
description: Fixes the text snippets to packages in the user profile page.

title: chore: update @tscircuit/core to v0.0.367
description: Automated update of @tscircuit/core to v0.0.367.

title: chore: update @tscircuit/core to v0.0.366
description: Update @tscircuit/core dependency to version 0.0.366

title: improve multi-file inference when there's only a single tsx file
description: Improve multi-file inference when there's only a single TSX file

title: Add support for inferred entrypoint for webworker
description: Add support for inferred entrypoint for webworker

title: feat(eval): integrate node_modules resolution
description: Introduces a new utility function to resolve node modules using the package.json file and the "exports" field.

title: fix example13 (bad entrypoint)
description: Fixes the entry point for the example13 fixture by exporting the component directly instead of using a console.log statement.

title: More fixes for entrypoint inference
description: Fixes entrypoint inference and moves ordering to a separate fixture

title: allow entrypoint inference from @tscircuit/eval
description: Allow entrypoint inference from @tscircuit/eval

title: feat: add schematic manual edits
description: Adds schematic manual edits functionality.

title: fix publish workflow
description: Fix publish workflow

title: Increment package.json version
description: Increment package.json version

title: refactor: remove tsup related build config
description: Refactor the build configuration to remove the `tsup` related build config and modify the import method for `runFrameStandaloneBundleContent`.

title: fix project dir path for tsci push
description: Fix the project directory path for `tsci push` command

title: fix: use `bun install -g` instead of `bun add -g`
description: Update bun install command to use 'bun install' instead of 'bun add' for global dependencies

title: feat(clone): add support for URL format and improve snippet path validation
description: Add support for URL format and improve snippet path validation in the clone command

title: Make all requests to registry authenticated in push-snippet
impact:
Minor

Explanation:
The changes in this pull request are related to the authentication of requests to the registry API. Specifically, the changes ensure that all requests to the registry are made with the session token, which is obtained during the login process. This is a security-related change that improves the overall security of the application.

The changes are spread across multiple files, including `cli/auth/login/register.ts`, `cli/clone/register.ts`, `lib/registry-api/get-ky.ts`, and `lib/shared/push-snippet.ts`. The impact of these changes is considered minor because they do not introduce any new major features or fix any critical bugs. Instead, they focus on improving the security and reliability of the existing functionality.

title: use package root rather than entrypoint dir when pushing
description: Use package root rather than entrypoint dir when pushing

title: Remove poor inferred entrypoint in favor of eval entrypoints
description: Removes the automatic generation of the "entrypoint.tsx" file and instead relies on the specified "eval" entrypoints.

title: simple escaping for html for file content on admin pages
description: Escapes HTML special characters in file content to prevent XSS vulnerabilities on admin pages.

title: docs(docusaurus): fix meta tags & add descriptions
description: Fix meta tags and add descriptions to Docusaurus pages

title: Keyboard5 Fixes, Fix broken high density cases, perform section unraveling longer with more explicit earlyStop method based on iterations w/o change
description: Fixes issues with the high-density router and improves the method for determining when to stop unraveling.

title: Useless Via Removal
description: Remove the code for formatting and linting the code.
